attributes.action: All new houses built must have a rainwater storage system for toilet use. To be debated and action-ed through the Commons.
attributes.additional_details:
A little law - No Cost, big long-term benefit. Win-win.
Win for all of us, win for environment, win for utilities.

All new houses built must have a rainwater storage system for toilet use. To be debated and actioned through the Commons.
It's not brain surgery to see that it benefits all, at no cost. Energy-Environment-Electorate.
lukedogless@gmail.com
Luke Douglas-Home
